name: Multi-Active Delivery Essence
benefits: prepares skin for better absorption of subsequent skincare
supports skin barrier for smoother, more radiant skin
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply a few drops to the face and neck using your hands. Gently press into the skin. Use morning and evening before serums and moisturizers.
conflicts: Avoid combining in the same routine with direct acids
Avoid combining with retinoids in the same routine
warnings: If irritation occurs, rinse off and discontinue use.

name: Saccharomyces Ferment 30% Milky Toner
benefits: gently exfoliates to smooth skin texture
helps brighten and even skin tone
supports and strengthens the skin barrier
how_to_use: Use morning and evening after cleansing. Apply to face and neck using hands or a cotton pad. Do not rinse. Avoid the eye area.
warnings: If irritation occurs, reduce frequency or discontinue use.

name: Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner
benefits: exfoliates the skin’s surface for smoother texture
helps to even the look of skin tone
how_to_use: Use ideally in the PM, no more frequently than once per day. After cleansing, saturate a cotton pad and sweep across the face and neck. Do not rinse. Avoid the eye contour.
conflicts: Do not use with other direct acids in the same routine
Avoid using with retinoids in the same routine
Avoid using with peptides like Argireline or Buffet in the same routine
warnings: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun.
Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
